instructions:
This is the glancey MCP server codebase.

## Key Guidelines
- Use Gemini or Ollama for embeddings - NEVER use OpenAI
- Run `npm test` before committing
- One responsibility per commit

## Architecture
- src/index.ts - MCP server entry point
- src/search/indexer.ts - CodeIndexer with AST-aware chunking
- src/embeddings/ - Embedding backends (Gemini, Ollama)
- src/config.ts - Configuration loading with Zod validation
